title: Language Learning Simulation Utilizing Spatial Thinking and GIS

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational understanding of spatial concepts
context.additional_context: Learners solve language-based problems in virtual spaces via VR devices and experience the process of visualizing GIS data

learning_goals: Learners can connect geographical information with linguistic expressions using GIS-based simulation tools.
Learners develop the ability to linguistically analyze spatiotemporal relationships while observing changing data in virtual spaces.
Through project-based assessment, learners can demonstrate the process of simplifying complex datasets for communication.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
